mapper.sql: a.test_group AS "testGroup", a.test_code AS "testCode", a.test_name AS "testName", a.test_content AS "testContent", a.model AS "model", a.fabric_type AS "fabricType", a.sample_type AS "sampleType", a.acc_type AS "accType", a.status AS "status", a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user createBy ON createBy.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user updateBy ON updateBy.id = a.update_by
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM qc_trf_test_code a
WHERE a.id = #{id} and a.del_flag = 0

SELECT a.test_group AS "testGroup", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", createBy.name AS "createBy.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", updateBy.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM qc_trf_test_code a
${ew.customSqlSegment}
